page.title: 08HEALTH.
page.content: The Area is noted for the longevity of its inhabitants. At the moment there is one resident who is 101 years old and several people who are over eighty. There are no resident doctors or nurses. Local surgeries are held at Holt, Walsingham or Fakenham the nearest of which is four miles away. Some prescriptions are delivered from Walsingham Surgery. The nearest hospital is at Cromer, with hospitals at King's Lynn and Norwich serving the area. There is a limited Home Help service for the elderly, no Meals on Wheels service or Day Care facilities.
